Articles.Content:
These are my recreations of the SR-71 Blackbird and the YF-12 Kedlock using KSP .25. The two models are identical, however, Kedlock has an internal bomb bay with two propelled bombs. Both are a little difficult in tight circles, but that makes the models more accurate.

SR-71

YF-12

I'm having trouble putting photos into the post, so heres the link for the dropbox folder.

Photos

Let me know if theres anything you guys want me to add or modify.
One of the neater SR-71's on the exchange +1 from me man, ill try it out later tonight.
thanks man I'm also working on an F-104 Starfighter and Eurofighter Typhoon model
